Marylize Biubwa bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na ekwute on ụmụ nwanyị

Ọrụ Biubwa dabeere na ikpe ziri ezi nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na-nkwusi ike na enweghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị, ebe ụmụ nwanyị ya bụ na nchikọta lekwasịrị anya n'ihe gbasara ikike mmadụ. Ọ bụ onye isi ojii ma burukwa nwanyị na-edina nwanyị ibe ya.
